movie.title: Invincible
movie.actors: Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear, Elizabeth Banks, Kevin Conway
movie.plot: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.
movie.tomatoConsensus: As simple and authentic as the gritty South Philly invirons in which it's set in, Invincible sends a uplifting and heartfelt message packed with an athletic enthusiasm that shouldn't be missed.
